channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Sinkhole not repaired and warnings/barriers totally inadequate, 29th July
item.description:
This has been left like this for two weeks now. It is a busy A-Road in a built-up area and next to a busy supermaket entrance. There have been several near misses (horns blasting and at night this route is used by HGVs/Artics). The barriers are inadequate and falling down and there are no reflectors or flasing beacons to warn drivers at night. An accident is imminent if this is not addressed soon.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 163 Cirencester Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken Branch comes into road and will hit double decker, 29th July
item.description:
Broken Branch comes into road and will hit double decker on entering Andoversford from the dual carriageway. Double Deck buses are to be used on this route from 29th August.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Puffers Cottage Gloucester Road, Andoversford
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abaindoned sofa cushions and other stuff, 28th July
item.description:
Sofa cushions and blankets, bin bags etc in park near pitch and putt, just down from the big cedar, Albemarle Gate. There was someone camping here for the past week but the tent has gone now. (There was a knife left on the ground but another dog walker has taken that home to dispose of safely )

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 30 Albemarle Gate, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 141 Gloucester Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Verges, 28th July
item.description:
Bothe verges along Dog Lane require cutting as plants on verges are whipping either side of vehicles traveling down lane. Some of these verges are owned by Highways when Brockworth bypass was constructed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Dog Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road markings on speed bumps faded, 28th July
item.description:
The chevron markings for the speed bumps on Fiddlers Green are very faded, worst of all just by Edendale Rd where the bump is also under a tree and so the shadow makes it very hard to spot where the speed bump is.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 77 Fiddler's Green Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath restricted from overgrowth, 27th July
item.description:
The bushes alongside this footpath is overgrown and starting to restrict access for pedestrians etc In a couple of weeks time when the footpath is blocked you will have pedestrians stepping out into the 50mph road just to get by. This is in various places from lampost marker 61 to the kennels/cattery.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Box Trees Cheltenham Road East, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
